mapper.insert: insert into resource (ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, CONTENT, FIRST_TIME, LAST_TIME, MEMORY, NOTE, MARK) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{memory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mark,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

update resource
